*pox_extension.py* module
=========================

:any:`OpenFlowBridge` is a special version of OpenFlow event originator class

:any:`ExtendedOFConnectionArbiter` dispatches incoming OpenFlow connections to
fit ESCAPEv2

Module contents
---------------

   :members:
   :private-members:

   :undoc-members:
